Picnic tables with good shadows a few meters from the parking area.

title: (36512) Prado - 5064 Lugar Liñares

A very nice employee explained everything to us, despite the language barrier. The only drawback is that the parking lot is inclined.

title: (36543) Silleda - N-640

description:
Attention: Temporarily closed until further notice. Please book first.
Agrospace for coaches or motorhomes with real privacy. Each of the places in a natural environment, with a river, mills and places to discover. 2 km away you will find the town of Silleda to have tapas and get to know each other. Lalín is 10 km away, a town that is also worth it. Capital of Galician stew and churrasco. It is preferable that you come loaded and here you enjoy the surroundings and the tranquility.

title: (36547) Silleda - 10 Poblado Currelo

title: (36597) Vila de Cruces - 23 EP-6306

title: (36528) Agolada - PO-840

In Agolada, there are paths along the Arnego river, where you can see the rare cork oak woods that there are in Galicia, el Sobreiral do Arnego, And also in the city center, you can see Os Pendellos, ancient popular market declared of historical interest and used to organize festivals and fairs. Monday morning market.

title: (36590) Vila de Cruces - 44b PO-905
description: Area of ​​Motorhomes Vila de Cruces. It is located on the esplanade behind the municipal pavilion. Nearby there is a park with swings. In the square right opposite, next to the church there is a fountain with drinking water. The bad thing about the place is that it is hard.

title: (36586) Vila de Cruces - PO-6502

Google Maps sends you to the park itself, it is the wide area that you can see next to the park. there is room for two cars or three medium camper

title: (32136) Oseira -

title: (27512) - Unnamed Road

Hostel 600m away with a menu of the day on request, sandwiches, hamburgers,... at a very good price.

title: (32130) Cea - 15 Rúa Campurro

Nice view to the lake. Possibility to swim.

title: (36587) Vila de Cruces - Unnamed Road

title: (15819) Portodemouros -

title: (15819) Portodemouros -
description: Small esplanade on the edge of the reservoir; very quiet to spend the night. No services.

title: (15819) Portodemouros -

title: (15822) - 37 Lugar Fonte Diaz

title: (15806) - 4 Lugar Sandion

title: (32428) Leiro - OU-0306

name: Teiraboa Basecamp
title: (15810) Teiraboa Basecamp
description: Camping located in Arzúa (Galicia). The road to Santiago runs a few meters away. Easy access through the n-547 and 20 minutes from the airport of Santiago de Compostela. We have places for motorhomes and caravans fully equipped with water intake, access to individual TV and power. We have a place enabled for emptying gray and black water. We have a pool, soccer and basketball field, barbecue area, clothesline, coin washer, playground and wifi for customers.

title: (15819) A Portela - N 547
description: Casa Garea, bar/restaurant/grocery and picnic area. Space for 3 ACs.

title: (15819) Arzúa - 1 Rúa Basilio Carril
description: Ville parking you can park on this street online or at the sports center in the battery, better than the perfect van that abound in the quiet center

title: (32420) Leiro - 1 Praza Campo da Feira

title: (32140) Vilamarín - N-525
description: Motorhome area in the GALP gas station. Allowed at night.

title: (32433) Faramontaos -
description: Parking at a crossroads with little traffic. Right at the starting point for hikes. no service We stood here one night with no problems. The entrance is a bit narrow, but we managed to get through the two stones with a Peugeot Boxer L2H2.

title: (36681) A Estrada - 51 Lugar Figueroa de Arriba
title_short: (36681) A Estrada - 51 Lugar Figueroa de Arriba
description: Next to the municipal swimming pools of A Estrada, several places for battery parking, a 7-meter motorhome can fit without leaving the line. Flat. Nice shady pool.

title: (36689) A Estrada - 16 Lugar Godoi

title: (36117) Campo Lameiro - 39 Lugar San Isidro
description: The town of San Isidro de Montes is a beautiful place. Two adjoining parking lots, where you can spend the night in a quiet place about 8 motorhomes. To do hiking trails. Drinking water source. A baker passes by every day. Children's park and just 4 km from the Campo Lameiro cave art interpretation center. Very friendly people!

title: (27200) Palas de Rei - 3 Estrada de Quindimil
title_short: (27200) Palas de Rei - 3 Estrada de Quindimil
description: Very wide main street, some traffic.

title: (15819) O Pazo - 15 Agra de Vales
description: Flat parking, nothing extraordinary but for the night it helps out.

name: Pazo Santa María
title: (15819) Pazo Santa María
description: Free parking for motorhomes located next to the best restaurant in the area called "Fonte do Picho" (number 1 on Tripadvisor) and a historic building from the s. Rehabilitated XVIII, the Pazo Santa María, which has a terrace bar with views of the Rendal Valley (Val do Iso) and laundry services, massages, electric bicycle rental, horseback riding, etc. for guests and visitors. Well located to get to know the town of Arzúa "Terra do Queixo de Arzúa" or do some stage of the Camino De Santiago. THE DRAINING OF GRAY AND BLACK WATER IS PROHIBITED.

title: (27200) Palas de Rei - 12 Rúa Hortas
description: It is a small plot of land that is the Eroski parking lot. It is open 24 hours and there is a laundry, bars and supermarket at the end of the street. We did not see signs and we spent the night with a small van.

title: (27200) Palas de Rei - Estrada de Quindimil
title_short: (27200) Palas de Rei - Estrada de Quindimil
description: Very quiet parking area under an old oak tree and other shady trees. There is a picnic area in front. and a highway through little traffic. I took a nap and will come tonight to sleep.

title: (27516) Chantada - Unnamed Road
description: Charming place to get lost in nature, next to the reservoir with the possibility of bathing, I don't know if they allow you to spend the night but because of the pints there shouldn't be any problem.

title: (27209) Palas de Rei - Carretera Centro de Salud
title_short: (27209) Palas de Rei - Carretera Centro de Salud
description: Palas de Rei service area, only for services, but you can spend the night in the village.

title: (15823) O Pino - 19 Lugar Brea
description: It is a gigantic parking lot away from the road and next to the Camino de Santiago. It is a gigantic parking lot with a green area also of an apparently abandoned sports field. A place without any kind of service but it seems totally quiet

title: (15806) A Eirexe - 4 Lugar Eirexe
description: Small, very quiet, rural church square, slightly sloping, access by compact CC country road <7m recommended.

title: (15823) O Pino - 12 CP-0605
description: Parking area wide enough, without services, restaurants nearby, ideal for the Camino de Santiago stage.

title: (27594) Saviñao -
description: Very quiet place to stay day and night in the middle of nature, Romanesque church next door and good routes for mountain biking and hiking.

title: (15821) O Pedrouzo - 9 Rúa Concello
description: Parquin in the town without services, is a parquin that would fit 2 Ac one in corner next to the park and the next square. There they do not bother but there was parking here to go to the sports center.

title: (27515) Chantada - 5 LU-P-1801
description: Iglesia Santa María de Nogueira, Chantada.Lugo Religious paintings somewhat transgressive. It is believed that they were made by artists inspired by the Sistine Chapel. Interesting. Very good for Antonio who acts as a guide on the visit. The road is complicated from Chantada, but we did it with a 7.5 m AC. When you get to the church there is an esplanade.

title: (36121) Cotobade - Unnamed Road
description: A place in the middle of nature that helped us to make a stop on the way and visit the San Xusto baths that are further down on the banks of the river. There was a picnic area upstairs. It was very good.

title: (36839) La Lama - CP-0306
description: Old soccer field, to spend the night in peace.

title: (36678) Pontevedra - 40 Lugar Barrio Castrolandin
description: Castro de Castrolandín, a beautiful place surrounded by nature, our camper is great and we arrived without difficulty at the entrance. Esplanade to park and walk to the fort. Highly recommended to stop. No service, just nature and fantastic views

title: (15821) O Pedrouzo -
description: New area in O Pino Very well located and close to the Camino de Santiago. Ideal for sleeping in the middle of nature. With no noise around. It is located next to the municipal swimming pool. Therefore, you can use the pool and showers in summer from 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. for a fee. There are 2 parks right next door, one for children and one for adults. Also a walk in the middle of nature.

title: (36853) Antas - 2 Lugar Hermitas
description: Good place in the church of A Ermida, with a monument to the emigrant in stone. Lots of stone tables and benches covered in a large grove, very close (3km) to the Liñares fervenza. Perfect place to eat in the shade of a tree and spend a very quiet night, it is next to a mountain road with little traffic.

title: (32150) A Peroxa - 22 Subida Centro Salud
description: Motorhome area, authorized to spend the night in the village.

title: (36119) Campo Lameiro - 3 Lugar Paredes
description: Lameiro Field Parking, archaeological center with rock engravings from 4000 years ago. 5 euros, 3 with discount. Better at the first or last hour to see them well.

title: (36677) Cuntis - EP-8403
description: Area with tables to eat in the shade. Large parking area where you could sleep.

title: (32450) Papeira - 6 Lugar Barbantes
description: Parking located next to the river. A little further on there is a fountain and a "beach" and a platform to enjoy the river. It is about 100 m from the AC service area, but the area is much quieter. There are some trees that provide shade. Some of the photos correspond to the AC area, not to this point described.

title: (32450) Cenlle - 5 Lugar Barbantes
description:
Great stop over. Very clean and new full campervan service,  AND FREE! 
Free hot spring facilities, conveniently located bar service with sandwiches,  etc. 
The people in charge is very kind and helpful. 
At least a little order will be very welcome.

title: (32430) Prado de Miño - Unnamed Road
description: This place is perfect to sleep one night. It is the place of a fishing club—as per shown by the 20 fishing docks—but it is  no private road. Tables and permanent BBQ are available and the place is very quiet. The river flows quietly and the trees offer a good shade from the morning sun. The road to get there is a bit narrow, steep and nasty: I would not suggest this place for bigger vehicles. I had no problem with my Viano.

title: (27548) Cuñas - LU-P-5819
description: This is the lower shaded car park at Praia da Coba. It's next to the beach and restaurant busy by day  but quiet at night. It is on the road but few cars pass after closing hours. Discretion required if staying overnight. Beautiful swimming spot with beach. Neither the access road (very steep and narrow) nor the parking places (large car size and closely spaced) are suitable for large motorhomes. We did it in a VW T6.

title: (15883) Pontevea - Rúa Ignacio Varela
description: Pernas Multicentro car park with car wash service, laundry service, gas station with supply of gas cylinders, toilets.

title: (32940) Toén - 4 Arrabal a Carretera
description: Ground parking of the soccer field. Next to the river Miño and under the shade of trees. I have not stayed to sleep but it seems like a good place

name: Área Fluvial A Praíña
title: (36683) Área Fluvial A Praíña
description:
Private venue managed by the ENTREAPONTES Association. Located 13 km (9 km by highway) from Santiago de Compostela, 20 minutes by bus from the Intermodal Station. River beach within the enclosure with a beach bar and large terrace, organization of concerts... Exclusive and limited area for campers, caravans and motorhomes of 16,000 m2 out of a total of 36,000 m2. Modalities of collaboration and use of the facilities:
 Contribution of elements such as awnings, chairs, tables... together with the camper for 1 day/night of camping in collaboration with a donation to the association, as a novelty the BARBECUE area for use by Camper users and partners on request.
 Garbage collectors outside. Multiple conventional bathrooms, taps to load water, empty wastewater, laundry rooms; complementary services:
Tourist Information Office, Shop/Bakery (Bread and empanadas to order the day before, sale of coal €4 per 3kg bag)...
 Adjacent to Ponte Vea (medieval bridge), declared an Asset of Cultural Interest (BIC) The large areas of sun and shade also stand out. The enclosure is fenced with access gates. There are hiking trails on both sides of the Ulla River. Supermarket, gas station, ATM, pharmacy, bars, restaurants... 300/400 meters.

                 BASIC RULES
1 - Quiet hours from 12:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m.
2 - You cannot make fires on the ground or barbecues outside the designated area.
3 - Maintain hygiene in the enclosure: leave the waste inside its relevant containers.
4 - Respect the vegetation of the enclosure.
5 - Maintain respect for users and workers.
6 - The use of devices that can cause acoustic disturbances (speakers, instruments) is prohibited.
7 - The consumption of drugs or narcotics within the premises is prohibited.
8 - Clothes cannot be hung in unauthorized places.
9 - All the rules of the internal regulations of the A Praíña Fluvial Area must be followed.

title: (15883) Teo -
description: AC do Xirimbao area. Overnight area of the City Council of Teo. It has 4 specific spaces for motorhomes in the middle of a large car park that allows the installation of more campers. Inoperative night lighting, picnic tables under the oak trees, 1 operational public toilet, space for emptying gray and black water and water loading. The city council is working to increase services with electrical connection points in parking spaces. It is a natural area integrated into the Natura 2000 Network. A pedestrian suspension bridge, called "Mariola", allows you to cross the River Ulla to the neighboring town hall of A Estrada. A pedestrian path, which is taken along the river, takes you to the nearby town of Pontevea, located 3 km away following that path. Bathing indicated with various signs is prohibited because it is an area of currents. The City Council of Teo appreciates that if it detects any incident in the area, notify the entity by contacting the local Development and Tourism offices (Monday to Friday from 08:00 to 15:00 or by email aedl at teo.gal) or with the police local or Civil Protection from Monday to Sunday from 08:00 to 22:00 (You can obtain the telephone numbers on the internet, since they are eliminated here).

There are 2 cafeterias with terraces and a jetty for water activities. Next to the train station, one of goods passes at 4am. Due to the covid scam, the bars were closed, but we live a normal life in our mobile home, so I encourage all human beings not to lose batteries of the battery that we have to live, and start enjoying these landscapes. long live Galicia!

PARKING WITH LARGE PLOTS AND IMPRESSIVE VIEWS OF SANTIAGO. BUS STOP 150 meters away WHICH TAKES YOU TO THE CITY CENTER IN 15 MINUTES.

MONITORED 24 HOURS. COME AND ENJOY THE TRANQUILITY IN AUTOCAMPER COMPOSTELA.
